website_summaries.verdict: Fewer intensity options than dial switch pumps, but many find it more comfortable and portable than higher-priced options.
pros: No-lean design for comfortable pumping position
Three intensity settings plus gentle starting mode
Massage cushion and comfort petals help stimulate milk flow
cons: Getting the hang of the settings can be a challenge

customer_reviews.title: Nice pump but not to much strength at pumping
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hoping it would be nice especially with the massage fit which was comfortable but this pump is slow at all speeds. I needed a pump for work and this comfortable but very slow at all three speeds. Also even at the highest speed, it’s not to strong. Love the bottles but not crazy about the pump
customer_reviews.author: Review user

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for over a month & I very much like it. It doesn't take up much space. I keep it beside my rocking chair in my daughter's room & it looks great. I haven't transported it anywhere but I imagine it's easy to, it comes with a bag. The instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Kat R

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This pump is preferred by my wife because it doesn’t pinch and isn’t uncomfortable. Great little pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love how compact and quiet this unit is
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact and quiet this unit is! I had a Spectra S2 and this unit is just as good, if not a little better - especially as it relates to having to tote it around.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Good pump and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Breast pumps are expensive. This little thing is a good buy if you’re looking to save money, but not wanting to buy junk. It’s light and easy to pack up. Isn’t too quiet though. But it’s not loud either. Suction is good and I love how every Avent bottle can be used to pump into. If you buy this pump considering buying everything Philips Avent.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pump!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research prior to buying this pump. I love it ! Comfortable, great suction . I like it way better than my medela. Easy to use . Not a lot of parts or buttons which I like . I use it every day multiple times . 6 months going strong and no problems. You will have to replace the valves around 3 months . Definitely get it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump because I read so many recommendations on it and it's rated one of the top pumps on several blogs/sites. But it just wasn't a good fit for me. The suction seemed to be weaker on one side and it never felt like to completely emptied my breast. I hand to massage a lot of it out by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Minchew

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good pump, lightweight, easy to use, easy to assemble. I would recommend buying a bra with this it will be way easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Correa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Product is terrible. Milk gets backed up into the machine. I only had this machine one month and it no longer works. When I tried contacting customer service, I could not get in contact with anyone. DO NOT waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: cool avent pump
customer_reviews.text: nice pump , powerful and does the job . it comes with nice black bag with two small bottoles .and matches our avent bottle set
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: It's gentle but efficient
customer_reviews.text: I liked this a lot. The suction is not strong enough to be painful (unless your nipples are sore or hurt), but it is enough to work as it should. The pads seem to be useful, but I had to stop using them. Maybe it's because my breasts are small, maybe it's just the design, but the suction cups leak considerably when I use them with those silicone pads.
customer_reviews.author: MariaLux

customer_reviews.title: Best pump out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Much better than the single electric pump. Very low noise level and great suction in comparison to the single. It also massages you while pumping. Best pump out there to increase your milk supply.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: correct item was sent in 2 days - set it up and it’s working wonderfully! Love this pump and Amazon’s quick turnaround. Ordered this “double” electric breast pump and received a single one instead. Super inconvenient for somebody who’s expecting a newborn in a week. I’ve used this item in the past and was excited to get a replacement. Will update this review if I get the correct item.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: It’s really confortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like , it is so confortable and less painful than others
customer_reviews.author: Paola Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Talk to your insurance and pediatrician first!!
customer_reviews.text: The product may be just fine. I don't know. Fortunately, we talked to our doctor before opening. Your insurance provider is REQUIRED to cover breast pumps due to the ACA. However, your insurance company may require you purchase certain models or from particular vendors. Also, our pediatrician recommend a different brand. I'm getting my money back, but save yourself the trouble and talk to the experts first!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Peckham

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought two, one for work and one for home
customer_reviews.text: I like it’s simplicity. Four settings, one to help the milk let down and three levels for suction. It’s small for travel. It’s comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works just as I hoped. I mostly use only one side at a time. It works with the plastic bottles it came with and the glass Avent bottles just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This pump has been fantastic. We would suggest this as the main pump for any new parents! Double pump. Great job. Feels good. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This pump is affordable, comfortable, and easy to clean. If you're on the fence, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly F.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to use / clean
customer_reviews.text: Great power. Better than other pumps I have tried. Easy to disassemble and reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mah

customer_reviews.title: My wife love it.
customer_reviews.text: The suction is smooth, the cleaning is very easy. Excelent pump and great price.
customer_reviews.author: ORS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use and clean. Just what I expected and definitely I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stefany Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I used to use single pump when I gave birth to my first child. I love this pump and double pump helps me to shorten pumping time when I'm having the second child.
customer_reviews.author: Suppingirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but too heavy to carry outside home. I chose quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It pumps two to three times better than a hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent materials. The best was the time to delivery, about 5 days from the PO.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this pump second baby first time using avent product that suction feels like a natural latch and not to slow at all .. very easy to assemble and they give you breast pads along with the bag and extra suction cups to !
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Not much difference in settings.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this double pump to save time pumping since I was only using a single pump. I use the avent bottles and wanted the pump to work with what I already had so I figured buying this would be great. It's good, but not great. I purchased a hands free pumping bra kit by simplicity which works well and I'm able to massage while pumping, but It still doesn't make it any quicker then my single pump which had better settings. I don't feel much of a difference on the three levels on this machine. I definitely feel that it was a waste of $169. Will not be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: The outer box looks like it was once opened
customer_reviews.text: The outer box looks like it was once opened, making people suspect that it is not new.
customer_reviews.author: fantasy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This breast pump is seriously so amazing! I used it with my daughter and my son and I just bought a new one 5 years later for my 3rd child! I love everything about this pump! It’s definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I thought this pumpbwould be perfect since we use the Avent bottles
customer_reviews.text: This was the second pump I tried. The first was a free Ameda from the hospital, but I got tired of having so many different bottles, I thought this pumpbwould be perfect since we use the Avent bottles. Am I the only one who thinks this pump has absolutely no suction whatsoever?? I was so disappointed. I used both cushions, and tried without a cushion. Nothing. To make it worse, I waited a while to test it out, so now I can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: heather c

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong pump at all
customer_reviews.text: The worst electric pump for first time moms Not strong at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kinzi R.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The suction power was not as strong as I wanted it. I felt like my daughter got more milk out then the machine
customer_reviews.author: K'Lee Bender

customer_reviews.title: Philips Avent double breast pump for Dubai
customer_reviews.text: Bought it from the USA. Works fine in Dubai. Can't complain till now. They could provide breast milk collectors as an add in.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Jose

customer_reviews.title: It's excelent!
customer_reviews.text: It's excelent! has covered my expectations, easy to use, save, and especially sucks very well, has helped me make my milk bank in record time.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Melo

customer_reviews.title: no battery option
customer_reviews.text: would be better if it operates on batteries as i though it would!
customer_reviews.author: Saddam Naber

customer_reviews.title: Works only from AC socket
customer_reviews.text: Works only from AC socket. It is not possible to use batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pump sucks. It worked perfectly fine for the first few weeks and then just stop working. It’s take a very long time to pump breast milk. I honestly regret buying this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could use more suction and options to use. There are three options for the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Mason’s Moma

customer_reviews.title: Returned as an underperforming unit
customer_reviews.text: Underpowered unit - more of a toy quality - was returned quickly
customer_reviews.author: Paola Yolanda Gamboa Castillo

customer_reviews.title: I really hope it was not a waste to buy this pump
customer_reviews.text: I just used it for the first time and it is barely pumping any milk! I really hope it was not a waste to buy this pump!
customer_reviews.author: FH

customer_reviews.title: Protect the product
customer_reviews.text: The product seems intact but it needed to be retapped by USPS because there wasn’t an external box to protect it
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Within a month of use this pump lost the power of suction. Needed to buy Medela pump instead. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Ai

customer_reviews.title: Not bad ...it doesnt hurt
customer_reviews.text: I like the pump Its not noisy and easy to assemble It empty my supply smoothly with little time 15 min What i didnt like the suction on level 3 is not strong its almost same as level 2 Plus which is important the sucking power are not the same in both sides One last thing is that i wish it has smaller massage nipple to fit better with my nipple's size And also wish it has a timer instead of using my phone
customer_reviews.author: Rsh

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love the let down setting and the silicone petals to help massage for let down, they are what made the difference for me in getting more milk.
customer_reviews.author: Confombled05

product_meta.title: Philips Avent Double Electric Breast Pump + Bonus Power Cushion, SCF334/22
product_meta.description: Philips Avent Double Electric Breast Pump helps you save time and lets your baby enjoy the benefits of breast milk. Our pump also has a unique, soft cushion with massaging petals that help gently stimulate milk flow by mimicking your baby's natural suckling patterns. For additional suction, just attach the Power Cushion included. Unlike breast pumps that only operate properly when you lean forward, this breast pump allows you to sit comfortably upright as you express because the pump's angled neck lets milk flow naturally from breast to bottle. The breast pump is simple to use, with only a few lightweight parts that are easily assembled. Parts are dishwasher safe. It includes the Natural bottle and nipple for easier latch-on and transition between breast and bottle feeding. The Philips Avent Double Electric Breast Pump is backed by a 2-year warranty. Replacement Massage Cushions are available in 19.5mm or 25mm and Power Cushions in 27.5mm.
feature_bullets: Choose from 3 expression settings (low, medium, high) after starting in the gentle stimulation mode
Soft massage cushion with comfort petals, 25mm (2 included) to gently stimulate milk flow by mimicking your baby's natural suckling patterns; Power cushions (27mm), for additional suction, 2 included
Quiet, efficient pump with a comfortable pumping position due to unique no lean forward design
Compact, lightweight, easy to set up, express and clean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars298 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
